name: The Assassins: PD Games Volume 03
description:
The Assassins: PD Games Volume 3 is the one in a series of compilations of public domain games 'developed' by The Assassins who produced at least two hundred and fifty such compilations in the 1990's. Typically these contained between two and six games many of which had been featured on cover discs for the UK versions of magazines such as Amiga Power and Amiga Format. The games in this compilation were:
  • Megaball
  • Drip
